RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Agent Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; interacted with law enforcement during the traffic stop; involved in the arrest and questioning of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; location of questioning; had sufficient evidence to conclude that two vehicles were driving in tandem; agents were expected to arrive at the scene; involved in an incident where Agent Benavides asked IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. questions en route to the Border Patrol station
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: received a phone call from his supervisor regarding the traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and drove to Highway 16 and U.S. Highway 59; made contact with Officer Reymundo Reyes and approached IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; asked about Defendant's citizenship and travel plans; transported IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. to the Freer immigration checkpoint for further questioning; had a conversation with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. en route to the Border Patrol station, asking him questions and using bad language
defendant who was stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes and felt not free to leave after being handed a citation; asked about bus times to leave but was told to wait for the United States Border Patrol agents; testified that Agent Benavides asked him questions en route to the Border Patrol station, using bad language and talking very rude
